name: PodcastAnalytics
summary: Add podcast analytics to your iOS applications with Backtracks Podcast Analytics SDK
description:
The Backtracks Podcast Analytics SDK adds drop-in audio and podcast analytics to any iOS or mobile app fast.
Just add the SDK to get data that people thought was previously unattainable like listener engagement, retention, and more on both Android and iOS (watchOS, tvOS, etc.).
Get even more super powers with Backtracks Podcast Analytics Pro SDK which is available to Backtracks Podcast Analytics and Backtracks Measure customers.
